dad.title: To my dad, a warrior...
content: TW: cancer, death
This space was intended to contain a piece of HTML code created with my father to share something with him and keep a souvenir of him.
But fate had other plans, taking him away faster than expected.
In the absence of a trace created by him here, I offer him this small tribute.

My father was a warrior because he fought cancer for 18 years, with over 130 chemotherapy sessions. But by the end of June 2023, the verdict was clear: the chemotherapy was no longer effective, and cancer had won.
It was estimated that he had only a few months left to live, at most a year.
But this news took a toll on his mental health; depression joined the battle with cancer, and just one month later, everything escalated.
In early August, he lost all his cognitive abilities, his speech, his ability to eat and move, he no longer recognized his wife, was lost in the house he lived in for +30 years, ...
I was terrified by the thought of missing the opportunity to say goodbye and tell him I loved him before he ceased to be himself and disappeared.
He was hospitalized for a week, and by some miracle, he regained all his mental faculties and motor skills.
But this joy was short-lived.
On September 4th, his body couldn't hold on any longer, and he was hospitalized once again.

On September 7th, he sought the approval of the doctor who had been following him for all these years and the rest of the family to end his life before the cancers caused too much suffering and permanently affected his cognitive abilities. Aware that he was in the terminal phase, he no longer had any purpose that gave him the will to fight.
As difficult as it was, this decision made him smile again. He was laughing again, cracking jokes and punchlines as he used to.
He remained joyful until the very end.
On September 10th at 12 o'clock, he was placed in deep sedation, waiting for his body to collapse... he fell asleep hearing us, overcome by a fit of laughter mixed with tears of joy and devastation.

Perhaps this laughter also lightened the situation for the nurse who found it very difficult to accompany a conscious, sharp-minded man towards death, someone who was always kind to the medical staff.
On September 14th he dies.
18 years.
18 years during which our mother accompanied him, supported him, and did absolutely everything sho could for him.
If my father was a warrior, my mother is an immense warrior to whom we owe so much for having had 18 more years with our father.
Goodbye, my dear Pap's... üíñ

why.title: Why this feature?
contents: Twitch already has a blocked terms feature, but it's very basic and cannot do complex filtering.
If you block the word <mark>twitchat</mark>, chatters can easily bypass this restriction by sending <mark>twit_chat</mark> or <mark>twitchüÖêt</mark> and many other alternatives.
Bots like Nightbot or Wizebot allow you to filter messages with complex rules via what's called Regular Expressions.
Twitchat's automod feature allows you to use Regular Expressions but also tries to make usage of alternative chars useless for bypassing automod rules.
Before applying a rule it will replace all alternative chars, including accented ones, by their latin equivalent.
For example, <mark>ùï•üÖ¶‚ìòùíïùì¨üÑ∑üá¶üáπ</mark> will be replaced by <mark>twitchat</mark> before applying automod rules on it.
Warning though, this process has its cost on performance and may slow down twitchat a little if you have many rules and receive lots of messages.

delete.title: Is deleting a message efficient against doxxing?
contents: No.
But it's the only way to moderate a message after it's sent.
The main problem is that extensions like BetterTTV allow users to keep deleted message.
If you want to avoid this, you'll have to configure a chat delay (see chat options). If a message is deleted during this time lapse, it won't be displayed anywhere, even for BTTV users.
Note that the message is still sent to everyone so it's technically possible to get it. Just more complicated.
The only safe way of filtering a message is when Twitch deletes it based on blocked terms before sending it to everyone. But as explained before, it's very limited :/

changelog.title: Latest updates
changelog.heat_details: {LINK} is a Twitch extensions allowing viewers to click on your stream. Twitchat makes it dead easy to use it.

highlights.d:
Show animated text on your stream with the new dedicated overlay. A sort of equivalent to StreamElements alerts.

Use Triggers to show any text you want when you want.

Create custom Hype Trains based on tips from external platforms.

Mostly made for DJs that will soon lose most of their revenues, this allows them to benefit Hype Trains while actually earning money

Create quick polls chatters can vote on directly from the chat. Differences with native Twitch polls:
  • Title is optional
  • No automod
  • Up to 20 answers
  • Allow chatters to vote for multiple answers
  • Allow only subs/mods/vips/etc to vote
Comes with a dedicated overlay.

Create up to 100 timers and countdowns. Comes with new overlay for basic customization and a new render style for countdowns. Timers's states will be restored after reloading Twitchat. You could use it to create Subathon by adding time to a countdown everytime subs or bits are received.

Create custom free or paid actions thanks to StreamSocket Twitch Extension

This allows you to provide free or paid interactions on your stream the viewers can trigger from a Twitch panel.

New buttons:
  • Highlight top-most Q&A entry on overlay
  • Skip top-most Q&A entry
  • Close !alert message (see settings => chat features => enable chat alerts)

Twitch cut-off a service Twitchat was "abusing" to receive undocumented events. It's time to say goodbye to pinned messages and community challenge contribution notifications as well as related triggers.
Viewer count will only update every 5 minutes.

10 new labels available on the Labels overlay.
  • Generic follower ID, name and avatar (last follower for all platforms)
  • TkTok follower name and avatar
  • YouTube follower name and avatar
  • Twitch/YouTube/TikTok viewer counts

Each action can now have its own conditions. 15 new trigger events:
  • Start/end of a Chat Poll
  • Overlay highlighted message closed
  • Someone answers a message
  • Goal complete (see Goals overlay)
  • Voicemod: Enable/disable "Hear my voice"
  • Voicemod: Enable/disable "Voice changer"
  • Custom hype train start
  • Custom hype train level up
  • Custom hype train completed
  • Custom hype train failed
  • Custom hype train cooldown end
  • StreamSocket action
6 new trigger actions:
  • Mark message as spoiler
  • Control timers
  • Stop trigger execution
  • Start chat poll
  • Show/hide animated text
  • Control progress of a custom hype train

Many other things have been added or modified.
Read complete changelog here

Even though I recently accepted a job offer, Twitchat has been my main activity for almost 3 years without any other source of income.

If you can afford it, a one-time donation on PayPal or a monthly support on Patreon would be super appreciated ‚ù§Ô∏è

gngngn.title: üò° Unacceptable üò°
contents: So, you're angry.
That's something I can understand.
May i share my point of view on this?
Twitchat is made by a single person (hello üëã) and required more than 2 year of full time work to date (january 2024).
I'm allowing everyone to use it for free but it costs me money and a lot of time and efforts. I don't get ANY revenue from it besides very few donations (on which I pay 30% taxes).
I'm not sponsored by any company, I'm not gathering your personal info to sell them, and It's ad free (yes).
We're not talking about advertising here. I'm not advertising for products or whatever that would generate constant revenues.
I'm just sharing a link to Twitchat.
You can donate to disable it.
I'm not even asking for a specific amount. You can donate one dollar if you think my work isn't worth more than that, then you'll be able to disable that message.
And if you don't want to pay anything, Twitchat is open-source. You're free to create an instance for yourself.
For all these reasons, I don't think it's horrific to push a sporadic message on your chat and I see no good reason for you to be angry about that.
If you still think this automatic message is unacceptable, you're free to stop using Twitchat!
But, please, don't take free services for granted. They require a lot of time, efforts and knowledges to create.
I hope this makes things look less "evil" and that you understand my point of view :)
‚ù§ Have a nice stream ‚ù§
Best regards,
Durss
gngngn.why_info: Because it's the easiest and because, let's be honnest, if i was posting from another account you would ban it right away to avoid the message from being sent on chat.
gngngn.angry: I already tell my viewers about Twitchat regularly, I don't like this intrusive message!
angry_contents: But I have no way to know about that.
Still, you can customize the message and everytime a link to "twitchat.fr" is sent on the chat (by any viewer, wizebot, nightbot, etc...) the timer is reset to 0.
This means that when telling about Twitchat to your viewers, if you send the link, the 2h timer will be reset.

heat.donate: üéÅ Please consider donating to Scott, Heat's creator
heat.anonymous: By default, Heat interactions are anonymous. To not be anonymous, viewers have to open the extension params, go on "Manage access" then click "Grant"
heat.click_source_info_description: Detecting click on OBS sources requires lots of exchanges with OBS to compute the positions of your sources. Depending on your scenes complexity this may take some time. For performance reasons, your sources positions are cached for 30s. If a source is moved, it may take up to 30s for its new position to be taken into account. If you REALLY need it, you can use the  {CMD} command to manually clear the cache.

Twitch as large API quota usage, but still limited, depending on you chat activity and the options you enabled, you might reach those limits, which could be source of problems.

heatDistort.title: OBS source distortion
heatDistort.description: This overlay makes it possible for your viewers to distort your stream rendering by clicking on it.
heatDistort.install: This needs you to {HEAT} on your Twitch channel and {SHADER} plugin on OBS.
heatDistort.install_instructions:
• Set width to twice the viewport size (ex: 3840px for 1920px stream).
  • Set height to viewport's height (ex: 1080px).
  • Hide the source out of screen
  • Set framerate to 60fps
  • Add Shadertastic filter to the parent scene
    • Effect: Displacement map (Source)
    • Displace: mode: Displace + Overlay
    • Color Space: RGB
    • Strength X/Y: 0.050
    • Displacement Map: the browser source you just created
heatDistort.select_target: Select the OBS item you want the effect to be applied to
heatDistort.premium_locked: Disable another distortion or become premium to enable this one

Enable this if you want to handle clicks yourself from triggers.
Ex: you can allow a user to click for a specific amount of time after a sub, bits, channel points rewards, ...

    • Displacement Map: the browser source you just created

playability.header: Connect Twitchat with {LINK} and control it from the Triggers
playability.info:
PlayAbility is designed to make video games accessible to people with disabilities by allowing to control them with your face.

Connecting Twitchat to PlayAbility will allow you to trigger keyboard, controller, or mouse keys from the Triggers. For example, let your viewers shoot for you from a channel points reward, a sub, a raid, a donation, ...

discord.code:
## :link: Link Twitchat with Discord
Open Twitchat, and enter the following code under **parameters => discord**.
# `{CODE}`
The code will expire in 1 minute.
## :rotating_light: Discord permissions
Go under `Server settings ‚ñ∫ Integrations ‚ñ∫ Twitchat ‚ñ∫ Commands` to define who can use each commands.
:warning: Please also make sure the bot has access to the chans you want it to answer to.
discord.install_instructions:
:no_entry: No twitch user has been linked to this discord.
Please use </{CMD}:{CMD_ID}> command to link your Twitchat account with this discord.
discord.link_success:

This discord is now linked with `{LOGIN}` Twitchat account.
Use </{CMD_SAY}:{CMD_SAY_ID}> command to send a message on Twitchat or </{CMD_ASK}:{CMD_ASK_ID}> command to send a message asking the streamer to answer by Yes or No.

shareParams.title: Parameters sharing
shareParams.description:
You requested to share parameters with {REMOTE_USER} account.

If you agree, parameters from current account, {CURRENT_USER}, will be replaced by the ones of {REMOTE_USER}.
Then, any change from one account will be applied to the other.

This includes your triggers, chat column filters, chat features, chat appearances, counters, values, overlays, TTS, automod params, ... Everything.
shareParams.error:
Something went wrong when finishing data sharing process.
Your data remain not shared.
shareParams.error_cross_link: These account are already linked the other way, there's not need to link your accounts the way you did.
shareParams.error_csrf:
You took to long to complete linking.
Please try again.
shareParams.wrongAccount:
You must log-in back with your secondary account.
To do so, when redirected to Twitch, switch account by clicking the link at the top of the page as shown below:

alerts.title: Create your own alerts
alerts.info_1: With Twitchat you can create your own sub/follow/reward/poll/... alerts by controling your OBS sources, their content and their filters.

streamdeck.title: Stream Deck‚Ñ¢ plugin
streamdeck.info_1: Twitchat can be controlled from your Stream Deck‚Ñ¢.
streamdeck.info_2: You can pause the chat, scroll it, mark messages as read, moderate, pin and highlight messages, open poll/prediction/bingo/raffle state and much more with the push of a button.

obs_stop.title: Stop your stream on raid
obs_stop.info_1: Twitchat can automatically stop your OBS stream after you raided someone.

bingo.title: Create a bingo
bingo.info_1: You can create a bingo in which your viewers will have to be the first to guess a number, a global emote, or any custom word.

raffle.title: Create a raffle
raffle.info_1: Create a raffle your viewers can enter using a chat command or a channel point reward.
raffle.info_2: A Twitchat overlay can show an animated wheel when picking a winner.

obs.title: Control OBS from chat
obs.info_1: Twitchat can change your current scene and mute/unmute your microphone from a chat command.
obs.info_2: If you forget to switch scene or unmute yourself, a mod can be there and do it for you as a backup.

api.title: Twitchat API
api.info_1: Did you know Twitchat exposes an API?
api.info_2: If you're a developer, you can control and get events from Twitchat.

music.title: Control music
music.info_1: Link Twitchat with Spotify to display the currently playing track on your stream as well as giving your viewers control over the playback from chat or channel point rewards.
music.info_2: You can even create your own song request system!

overlays.title: Twitchat overlays
overlays.info_1: Twitchat provides some overlays for your stream.
overlays.info_2: It can display your currently playing music, an animated wheel to pick a raffle's winner, a timer, a countdown or highlight a message of your viewers .

countdown.title: Timer and Countdown

dad.title: √Ä mon p√®re, ce guerrier...
content: TW: cancer, d√©c√®s
Cet emplacement √©tait pr√©vu pour contenir un bout de code HTML cr√©√© avec mon p√®re pour partager quelque chose avec lui et en conserver une trace.
Mais la maladie en a d√©cid√© autrement, l'emportant plus rapidement qu'esp√©r√©.
√Ä d√©faut d'avoir ici une trace cr√©√©e par lui, je lui rends ce petit hommage.

Mon p√®re √©tait un guerrier car il s'est battu durant 18 ans contre les cancers, +130 chimioth√©rapies au compteur. Mais fin juin 2023 le verdict √©tait sans appel, les chimios ne faisaient plus effet, les cancers avaient gagn√©.
Il √©tait estim√© qu'il lui restait quelques mois √† vivre, 1 an tout au plus.
Mais cette nouvelle avait attaqu√© son mental, la d√©pression rejoignait le cancer, et seulement 1 mois plus tard tout s'emballait.

D√©but ao√ªt il perdait toutes ses capacit√©s cognitives, perdait la parole, ne savait plus se nourir ni se d√©placer, ne reconnaissait pas sa femme, se perdait dans la maison qu'il habitait de puis +30 ans, ...
J'√©tais terrifi√© √† l'id√©e d'avoir rat√© l'occasion de lui dire adieu et que je l'aimais avant qu'il ne soit plus lui-m√™me et disparaisse.
Il a alors √©t√© hospitalis√© 1 semaine et par miracle a retrouv√© tous ses esprits et capacit√©s motrices.
Mais cette joie n'√©tait que temporaire
Le 4 septembre son corps ne tient plus, il est √† nouveau hospitalis√©.

Le 7 septembre il demande l'accord au m√©decin qui le suivait depuis toutes ces ann√©es ainsi qu'au reste de la famille de mettre fin √† ses jours pour partir avant que les cancers ne le fassent trop souffrir et attaquent d√©finitivement ses capacit√©s cognitives. Ayant conscience qu'il √©tait en phase terminale, il n'avait plus aucun but lui donnant envie de se battre.
Aussi dure soit-elle, cette d√©cision courageuse lui avait fait retrouver le sourir. Il riait √† nouveau, encha√Ænait les blagues et punchlines comme avant.
Jusqu'au bout il sera joyeux.
Le 10 septembre √† 12h, il est plac√© en s√©dation profonde dans l'attente que son corps l√¢che... il s'endormira nous entendant pris d'un fou-rire m√™lant larmes de rire et de d√©vastation.

Ce fou-rire a peut-√™tre aussi eu le m√©rite d'all√©ger la situation pour l'infirmi√®re qui vivait tr√®s mal d'accompagner vers la mort un homme conscient, vif d'esprit et toujours adorable avec le personnel m√©dical.
Le 14 septembre au matin il s'√©teint.
18 ans.
18 ans durants lesquels notre m√®re l'a accompagn√©, soutenu, et a absolument tout fait pour lui.
Si mon p√®re √©tait un guerrier, ma m√®re est une immense guerri√®re √† qui on doit √©norm√©ment d'avoir eu 18 ans de plus avec notre p√®re.
Adieu mon p'tit Pap's... üíñ

why.title: Pourquoi cette fonctionnalit√©¬†?
contents: Twitch a d√©j√† une fonctionnalit√© de "termes bloqu√©s", mais elle est tr√®s basique et ne permet pas un filtrage complexe.

Si vous bloquez le mot <mark>twitchat</mark>, les viewers peuvent facilement contourner cette restriction en √©crivant <mark>twit_chat</mark> ou <mark>twitchüÖêt</mark> et une infinit√© d'alternatives.
Des bots comme Nightbot ou Wizebot permettent de filtrer les messages avec des r√®gles plus complexes via ce que l'on appelle des Expressions r√©guli√®res.

La fonction automod de Twitchat vous permet √©galement d'utiliser des expressions r√©guli√®res, mais tente √©galement de rendre l'utilisation de caract√®res alternatifs inefficace pour contourner les r√®gles de filtrage.
Avant d'appliquer une r√®gle, Twitchat remplacera tous les caract√®res alternatifs, y compris les caract√®res accentu√©s, par leur √©quivalent latin.
Par exemple, <mark>ùï•üÖ¶‚ìòùíïùì¨üÑ∑üá¶üáπ</mark> sera remplac√© par <mark>twitchat</mark> avant de lui appliquer les r√®gles de filtrage.
Attention cependant, ce processus a un co√ªt sur les performances et peut ralentir un peu Twitchat si vous avez beaucoup de r√®gles et que vous recevez beaucoup de messages.

delete.title: La suppression d'un message est-elle efficace contre le doxxing*¬†?
contents: Non.
Mais c'est le seul moyen de mod√©rer un message apr√®s son envoi.
Le principal probl√®me est que des extensions comme BetterTTV permettent aux viewers de conserver les messages supprim√©s.

Si vous voulez √©viter cela, vous devrez configurer un d√©lai de chat (voir options de chat). Si un message est supprim√© pendant ce laps de temps, il ne sera affich√© nulle part, m√™me pour les personnes utilisant BTTV.
Notez que le message est tout de m√™me envoy√© √† tout le monde, il reste donc techniquement possible de le consulter. Mais cela demande des connaissances en d√©veloppement.

Le seul moyen s√ªr de filtrer un message est de faire en sorte que Twitch le supprime avant de l'envoyer √† tout le monde. C'est ce que font les "termes bloqu√©s". Mais comme expliqu√© pr√©c√©demment, leur fonctionnement est tr√®s limit√© :/
*Le doxxing est l'acte de r√©v√©ler des donn√©es personnelles d'autrui publiquement.

changelog.title: Nouveaut√©s
changelog.heat_details: {LINK} est une extensions Twitch permettant √† vos viewers de cliquer sur votre stream.Twitchat vous simplifie d√©sormais grandement son usage.

highlights.d:
Affichez du texte anim√© sur votre stream avec le nouvel overlay d√©di√©. Une sorte d'√©quivalent aux alertes de StreamElements.

Utilisez les Triggers pour afficher le texte que vous souhaitez, quand vous le voulez.

Cr√©ez des Trains de la Hype personnalis√©s bas√©s sur les dons provenant de plateformes externes.

Principalement con√ßu pour les DJs qui perdront bient√¥t la majorit√© de leurs revenus, cela leur permet de b√©n√©ficier du syst√®me de Trains de la Hype sans donner tous leurs revenus √† Twitch.

Cr√©ez des sondages rapides auxquels les spectateurices peuvent voter directement depuis le chat. Diff√©rences avec les sondages natifs de Twitch¬†:
  • Le titre est optionnel
  • Pas d'automod
  • Jusqu'√† 20 r√©ponses
  • Permettre aux spectateurices de voter pour plusieurs r√©ponses
  • Permettre uniquement aux subs/mods/vips/etc de voter
Propose un overlay d√©di√©.

Cr√©ez jusqu'√† 100 minuteurs et comptes √† rebours. Livr√© avec un nouvel overlay pour une personnalisation basique et un nouveau style de rendu pour les comptes √† rebours. Les √©tats des minuteurs seront restaur√©s apr√®s rechargement de Twitchat. Vous pourriez utiliser ce syst√®me pour cr√©er un Subathon en ajoutant du temps √† un compte √† rebours √† chaque fois que des subs ou bits sont re√ßus.

Cr√©ez des actions personnalis√©es gratuites ou payantes gr√¢ce √† l'extension Twitch StreamSocket.

Cela vous permet de proposer des interactions gratuites ou payantes sur votre stream que les spectateurices peuvent d√©clencher depuis un panneau Twitch.

Nouveaux boutons¬†:
  • Mettre en surbrillance l'entr√©e Q&R la plus haute sur l'overlay
  • Passer l'entr√©e Q&R la plus haute
  • Fermer le message !alert (voir param√®tres => fonctionnalit√©s du chat => activer les alertes de chat)

Twitch ayant coup√© un service jusque l√† utilis√© pour obtenir des √©v√©nements non document√©s, il est temps de dire au revoir aux notifications de messages √©pingl√©s et de contributions aux d√©fis communautaires ainsi qu'aux triggers associ√©s.
Le viewer count ne se mettra plus √† jour que toutes les 5 minutes.

10 nouvelles informations disponibles pour l'overlay de Labels.
  • ID, nom et avatar g√©n√©riques du dernier follower (dernier follower pour toutes les plateformes)
  • Nom et avatar du dernier follower TikTok

Chaque action peut d√©sormais avoir ses propres conditions. 15 nouveaux √©v√©nements de trigger¬†:
  • D√©but/fin d'un sondage de tchat
  • Message mis en avant sur l'overlay ferm√©
  • Quelqu'un r√©pond √† un message
  • √âtape de Goal remplit (voir overlay Goals)
  • Voicemod¬†: Activer/d√©sactiver "Entendre ma voix"
  • Voicemod¬†: Activer/d√©sactiver "Changeur de voix"
  • Train de la hype personnalis√© d√©bute
  • Train de la hype personnalis√© level up
  • Train de la hype personnalis√© termin√©
  • Train de la hype personnalis√© √©chou√©

6 nouvelles actions de trigger¬†:

gngngn.title: üò° Inacceptable üò°
contents: Tu es donc en col√®re.
Je peux le comprendre.
Puis-je te partager mon point de vue¬†?
Twitchat est cr√©√© par une seule personne (coucou üëã) et a n√©cessit√© plus +2 an de travail √† temps plein √† l'heure actuelle (janvier 2024).
J'offre ce travail √† tout le monde mais √ßa me co√ªte du temps, et de l'argent. A part quelques rares dons (sur lesquels je paye 30% de taxes) Twitchat ne me rapporte pas d'argent.
Je ne suis pas sponsoris√© par une marque, je ne collecte aucune donn√©e personnelle, et je ne mets aucune publicit√© √† l'exception d'un lien vers Twitchat post√© toutes les 2h.
Ce message peut √™tre d√©sactiv√© avec un don libre.
Tu peux m√™me ne donner qu'un euro, si tu estime que mon travail ne m√©rite pas plus, il te sera alors possible de d√©sactiver le message automatique.
Et si tu ne souhaite pas payer, Twitchat est open-source. Tu es libre de cr√©er ta propre instance.
Pour toutes ces raisons, je ne crois pas que ce soit si terrible d'avoir un lien post√© de temps en temps.
Si tu estimes tout de m√™me que c'est Inacceptable, libre √† toi de ne pas utiliser Twitchat¬†!
Mais, s'il te plait, ne prends pas les services gratuits pour acquis. Ils demandent beaucoup de temps et de connaissances pour √™tre cr√©√©s.
J'esp√®re que les choses semblent moins scandaleuses et que tu comprends mon point de vue :)
‚ù§ Bons streams √† toi ‚ù§
Cordialement,
Durss
gngngn.why_info: Soyons honn√™tes, si je postais avec un autre compte tout le monde le bannirait dans la foul√©e pour ne pas avoir les messages post√© dans leur tchat.
gngngn.angry: Je parle d√©j√† de Twitchat √† mes viewers, je n'aime pas ce message intrusif¬†!
angry_contents: Mais je n'ai aucun moyen de le savoir.
En revanche il est possible de personnaliser le message, et chaque fois que "twitchat.fr" est envoy√© dans le tchat (par un viewer, un bot ou vous-m√™me) le timer de 2h est remis √† 0.
Cela signifique que du moment qu'un lien vers twitchat est envoy√© dans le tchat toutes les 2h, le message automatique ne sera pas envoy√©.
